q: "We had a very, very good year and a very strong quarter," said Eric Schmidt . In the final quarter of 2010, Google turned a profit of$ 2.54 billion, or 1.86 billion euros. "It"s all very, very good. We are going to invest in Europe." Last week, Google announced that Eric Schmidt would be replaced by co-founder Larry Page starting on April 4.
